website.feature1_text: FluffyChat is designed to be as easy to use as possible. No one should be left behind.
website.feature2_text: The well polished design is based on Material You and works great on all platforms.
website.feature3_text: With end-to-end encryption, cross-signing and encrypted backups, FluffyChat is one of the most secure messenger out there.
website.feature4_text_html: You can choose the server you want to use or even self-host your own!
website.feature5_text_html: You can choose between Firebase Cloud Messaging or the more privacy focused Unified Push.
website.feature6_text: With spaces you can join or create a community which organizes chats and users. Using sub-spaces you can even nest your communities.
website.feature7_text: Still an experimental feature but you can already try out video and audio calls, compatible with other [matrix] clients.
website.feature8_text: Create your own sticker sets and share them with your friends. You can even use them as inline emojis.
website.feature9_text_html: FluffyChat is compatible with any other Element, Nheko, Cinny or NeoChat.
